summary: Small farm west of Whiterun. Hearthfires like planting.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/18187861/LittlePondFarm/LPFIntro.jpg[/IMG]

[B][SIZE=2]What this mod does[/SIZE][/B]
Small farm in tundra, west of Whiterun. 
You can use bed and everything inside and you can plant your own crops in soil on small field nearby.

[B][SIZE=2]Why I made it[/SIZE][/B]
There are plenty of great houses on Nexus already, but I wasn't able to find small (starter) player house near Whiterun for crops / flower planting introduced by Hearthfires DLC. I just want something small and cozy for my low level character. Humble beginnings I can remember later on :)

[B][SIZE=2]Video by Emad Wasfi[/SIZE][/B]
Thanks for making such incredible video!
[youtube]tyXEutDSLBg[/youtube]

[B][SIZE=2]Requires[/SIZE][/B]
Updated Skyrim, HearthFires DLC

[B][SIZE=2]Recommended mods[/SIZE][/B]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19281]Requiem[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163]Frostfall[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26228]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4955]83Willows 101BugsHD Butterfly Dragonfly Luna-Moth Torchbug[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26851]More plants and recipes for Hearthfire including Dawnguard and Dragonborn plants[/URL]

Thanks everyone! If you have any suggestions or comments, feel free to post them. They are appreciated.

[B][SIZE=2]My other mods[/SIZE][/B]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47356]Combat Caster[/URL] - changes to combat magicka regeneration
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/18187861/CombatCaster/CCSmall.jpg[/IMG]

[line]
